title: Congressman

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose assault, fraud, or gay marriage to make illegal each night.
> *Assault* — Anyone who attacks that night or the following day will be jailed the next night.
> *Fraud* — Anyone who uses a deceptive, investigative, roleblocking, redirecting, vote-influencing, or speech-influencing ability that night or the following day will be jailed the next night.
> *Gay marriage* — Anyone who visits someone that stayed at home that night, as well as the person they visited, will be jailed the next night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Each choice has a two-night cooldown.
- You can't jail yourself if that would somehow happen.
- You don't die if you're hanged.

desc:
Post 436
*An anti-gay Hungarian politician has resigned after being caught by the police fleeing a 25-man orgy through a window.*
